original_text: And Saul inquired of God, “Shall I go down after the Philistines? Will you give them into the hand of Israel?” But he did not answer him that day.
korean_text: 사울이 하나님께 묻자오되 내가 블레셋 사람들을 추격하리이까 주께서 그들을 이스라엘의 손에 넘기시겠나이까 하되 그 날에 대답하지 아니하시는지라

sentences.original_text: Shall I go down after the Philistines?
Will you give them into the hand of Israel?”
But he did not answer him
